title: TMK has established a scholarship for students of the Ural Federal University | AKM EN
text: The Pipe Metallurgical Company (TMK) has established a scholarship for students of the Ural Federal University (UrFU). 200 students of the Institute of New Materials and Technologies (INMT) will receive support annually UrFU. The scholarship in the amount of 15,000 rubles per month is awarded for one academic year from September to August inclusive to full-time students who are successful in their studies, mastering bachelor's or specialty programs, including first-year students. In addition to the monthly payment, the fellows will have the opportunity to practice at TMK enterprises, participate in corporate events, and after completing their studies, they will be considered for vacancies available in the company as a priority. "We support Ural Federal University in an effort to preserve the best traditions of metallurgical education, develop specialized departments, and attract more applicants. I am sure that TMK scholarships will help strengthen the status of INMT as a prestigious place of study, which opens up many prospects for students, and will give the children themselves an additional opportunity to focus on their studies and research activities," said Elena Pozolotina, Deputy General Director of TMK HR Management, Director of TMK2U Corporate University. "TMK is a strategic partner of our university, deeply involved in all its development initiatives: This includes the program of advanced engineering schools, the activities of a world-class scientific and educational center, and research within the framework of the Priority 2030 project. The university and the company are connected by dozens of scientific and educational projects, in particular, the training programs for students of the TMK2U corporate university. Finally, our golden fund consists of graduates who work at the company's factories," said Viktor Koksharov, Rector of UrFU. TMK participates in the formation of a number of UrFU educational programs, career guidance, including the organization of practices for university students and their involvement in competitions of innovative initiatives and professional skills. TMK2U Corporate University regularly initiates job fairs and hackathons at the university, supports the projects "Career Spring" and "Career Time", recruits candidates for the master's program "Management of a metallurgical enterprise", and also organizes the "Winter School" within the framework of the student Olympiad "I am a professional".Please note that this press release is based on materials provided by the company.
